mapper.select: select * from(select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rn, epi_review_tbl.* from (select @rownum:=0) as tmp, epi_review_tbl where all_drama_id=#{all_drama_id} and id>0 and userid=#{userid} order by epiNumber asc) boardList where rn>(#{cri.pageNum}-1)*#{cri.amount} and rn<=#{cri.pageNum}*#{cri.amount}
select count(*) from epi_review_tbl where all_drama_id=#{all_drama_id} and userid=#{userid}
mapper.update: update epi_review_tbl set score=#{score}, modifyDate=sysdate() where id=#{id}
update epi_review_tbl set epiReview=#{epiReview}, watchedDate=#{watchedDate}, score=#{score}, epiNumber=#{epiNumber}, modifyDate=sysdate() where id=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from epi_review_tbl where all_drama_id=#{all_drama_id} and userid=#{userid}
mapper.update: update epi_review_tbl set viewState=#{viewState} where id=#{id}
update epi_review_tbl set viewState=#{viewState} where all_drama_id=#{all_drama_id} and userid=#{userid}
